1712958682.521149.sceneDescription: A person is unwrapping and opening a sandwich package, then removing and placing two slices of bread on a wooden cutting board. After laying down the slices, they start to spread what appears to be a condiment on one slice of the bread.

1712958696.1679115.sceneDescription: In this series of video frames, someone is spreading a substance, likely margarine or butter, onto two slices of bread on a wooden board. Then, they briefly hold up a container labeled "Nuttelex Original," indicating this is the spread being used.

1712958710.4058402.sceneDescription: In this series of images, someone is preparing bread slices by spreading butter on them. They use a knife to take butter from a tub and spread it evenly across each slice of bread.

1712958732.8398764.sceneDescription: In this segment of a video, someone is spreading a creamy substance, likely butter or a spread, evenly across two slices of multigrain bread. They are using a knife to apply and smooth the spread on each slice, indicating they are preparing the bread for a sandwich or toast.

1712958744.5986264.sceneDescription: A person is placing a jar of homemade mixed berry jam on a cutting board near two slices of bread and then lifting the jar away to prepare for spreading the jam on the slices. The images capture the moments before and after the jar is presented, indicating that the person is likely making a sandwich or toast with jam.

1712958757.3418777.sceneDescription: In this video segment, someone is preparing a slice of bread with spreadable cheese and then applying a red jam or jelly on top of it. The process involves using a knife to spread the toppings onto the bread slices.

1712958768.821775.sceneDescription: In the video segment, someone is spreading a dark red jam or jelly on a slice of bread that already has a light spread, possibly butter or cream cheese, on it. They are using a knife to apply and evenly distribute the jam over one half of the bread slice.

1712958781.0120773.sceneDescription: In this segment of the video, someone is spreading jam on a slice of bread, sequentially covering the surface evenly with each passing second. The person uses a knife to apply and smooth the jam, preparing the bread for consumption.

1712958796.6006439.sceneDescription: Two slices of bread are being prepared with spreads, one with a white spread which could be butter or cream cheese, and the other with a red jam, after which they are put together to make a sandwich. The sandwich is then shown as a whole before the video ends.

1712958807.7501748.sceneDescription: In this segment of the video, someone is cutting a slice of bread into four triangular pieces. After cutting, they plate the bread pieces on a teal plate with a dotted pattern.

1712958821.6867313.sceneDescription: In this segment of the video, a person is cutting a sandwich into smaller pieces and arranging them on a plate. The individual triangle-shaped sandwich pieces are being placed on the plate in a pattern after each cut.

1712958832.1545806.sceneDescription: In this segment of the video, someone is cutting a sandwich into smaller pieces and arranging them on a plate. They start with a larger half of a sandwich, then cut it into quarters and present them neatly on the plate.
